app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice to Text Pro Transcribe
app_description: Redesigned from the ground up Voice to Text Pro 5.0 is the best tool for converting any audio into text. With Voice to Text Pro you won t need to type anything anymore you just speak and your speech is instantly converted into text. It s also possible to transcribe audio from other sources files. FEATURES WE LOVE Convert your speech to text Convert external files to text Share results to any app installed on your device or copy it to your clipboard Create notes based on your transcriptions or append text to existing notes Sync your notes across all your devices Optimized support for iOS 14 iPhone 12 iPhone 12 Pro and iPads And much more SUPPORTED LANGUAGES español Latinoamérica ไทย ไทย català Espanya français Belgique Deutsch Schweiz slovenčina Slovensko English South Africa español Chile ह न द भ रत 中文 中国 中文 台灣 dansk Danmark ह न द भ रत TRANSLIT Ελληνικά Ελλάδα עברית ישראל português Brasil English United Arab Emirates português Portugal français Suisse română România Tiếng Việt Việt Nam English Saudi Arabia polski Polska español Estados Unidos ह न द ल ट न English Singapore Türkçe Türkiye hrvatski Hrvatska 한국어 대한민국 українська Україна italiano Svizzera العربية المملكة العربية السعودية Indonesia Indonesia English India español España Deutsch Österreich English Ireland čeština Česko español Colombia 中文 香港 中國 svenska Sverige English Philippines English Indonesia English Canada Nederlands Nederland 粤语 中华人民共和国 English New Zealand English United Kingdom 日本語 日本 italiano Italia русский Россия English United States Bahasa Melayu Malaysia español México magyar Magyarország français Canada Shanghainese China Deutsch Deutschland français France suomi Suomi norsk bokmål Norge Nederlands België English Australia and more... PREMIUM FEATURES NEW Custom Dictionaries Add frequently used words and expressions to increase transcription accuracy. NEW Custom Dictionaries Quick access to selected languages based on your preferences. Ad free Ad sponsors help us keep offering the free version. Becoming Premium you won t see ads anymore. Longer recordings With longer recordings you are no longer limited to transcribe only 60 seconds of content at a time. Notes Becoming Premium you ll have a place to save your notes create new ones or append text to existing notes. External Files Becoming Premium you ll have the option to transcribe external audio files. REVIEW If you like it and find it useful please review the app! This means the world to us. Your love will keep motivating us and it will also influence others users. Reviews are the best way to prove that this app is great. Please review us! FEEDBACK If you have any feedback or run into issues please contact us via hugo.prione gmail.com. We re happy to help! SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS Premium features require an auto renewable subscription you will be charged per month or year to use them. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
